pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-5075] Remove consecutive empty lines when formatting PHP code
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-5075
Removes multiple empty lines from PHP code.
Adds setting under Formatting/PHP/Blank Lines.
Formatting options:

nodes.diffHunk: @@ -430,3 +430,8 @@ FmtWrapping.groupUseListLabel.text=G&roup Use List: FmtWrapping.groupUseBracesCheckBox.text_1=Group &Use Braces FmtBraces.groupUseLabel.text=G&roup Use: FmtAlignment.noteLabel.text=Note: These options depend on Wrapping settings +FmtBlankLines.jTextField1.text=jTextField1

nodes.bodyText: Nitpick: The given text field can be set to be "NOI18N" in its properties (this line would not be here than).

nodes.bodyText:
Please, add "blank" everywhere here as it is not apparent what exactly it does. The constant as well as the Symfony rule contains it. Thanks.
CC @junichi11
